testcase.name: Registration With Invalid details - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Go To Website Link Staples.com........................................passed Then Create Account.........................................................passed And Enter Invalid details to Register such as "abd@cd", "Dinesh","Seth","78888" and "test5".passed Then Verify error message in Email field...................................passed Then Verify error message in Phone number..................................passed Then Verify error message in password.......................................passed

testcase.name: Search with a value and Add a product to Add to cart Page
testcase.system-out: Given Enter search value in search Bar and search...........................passed Then In the selected product page click on Add to cart......................passed Then Verify that same product is added in Add to cart.......................passed Then Verify Cart Subtotal value.............................................passed
